titles.title: Fair Care for Kids Act of 2002
To amend the Child Care and Development Block Grant Act of 1990 to provide market rate payments for child care services provided under such Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 4/18/2002--Introduced. Fair Care for Kids Act of 2002 - Amends the Child Care and Development Block Grant Act of 1990 to require State plans to provide for payments at not less than applicable market rates for child care services provided under such Act.
